root.name: Greg Hastings' Tournament Paintball MAX'D
root.description: Greg Hastings Tournament Paintball Max'd (known as GHTP) is a simulation of the real game of paintball. Greg Hastings is an ex-professional paintballer for Team XSV, and implemented everything he knew about paintball, and put it into the game. FeaturesReal MarkersReal LeaguesReal Professional TeamsReal EquipmentReal Professional PlayersSnap-ShootingDivesTrue Layouts that mimick real event layoutsField EditorSoundtrackGHTP Max'd had two multi-platinum artists collaborate to create a theme song for GHTP Max'd. Those two artists were B-Real(An actual paintball player), and DJ Lethal.This is still a realistic depiction of the actual game, even though it has been released for quite some time.
